content.prompt: Which of the following lists activities outlined in the e-mail in the correct sequence?

choices.label: Go on a field trip, write an essay, study famous practitioners, and do a hands-on exercise
Study famous practitioners, do a hands-on exercise, write an essay, and go on a field trip
Do a hands-on exercise, study famous practitioners, go on a field trip, and write an essay
Study famous practitioners, go on a field trip, write an essay, and do a hands-on exercise

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
